storyInfo: Viviana follows the Gesatzswächter to the school, just as Federico and Micha arrive at the same time. Viviana finds the elderly scholar who is the Empresses' confidant, only to discover that he is the man who wishes to summon the Genesis Horn through Ebenholz.

attributes.content: Sorry, Frau Giallo. I made another mistake.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: Why did you stop?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I don't think I played the last bar on the last line very well...
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: Your heart is in the right place. Don't let yourself be bound by the melody. Instead, guide it with your will.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I can't help but think about what I did wrong though.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: Then don't hold yourself back.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Music is the voice of your heart. It's a language to express yourself with. If you let yourself be caught up in the grammar before learning how to speak, then language itself loses all meaning.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Your embarrassment, your self-doubt, and your thirst for the future... They're all real. So let them live in the sound of your instrument.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But that's not what my Arts professor said.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: He said that Originium Arts is a rigorous field of study. That it's about uncovering the order within chaos, like putting together a mess of unrelated notes to form a beautiful chord.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: But I'm having too many distracting thoughts, and my sound is all over the place. That's why I can't control the energy of my Arts well.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: I taught another student just like you before. He was reserved, shy, and not very good at expressing himself.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Wh-What happened to him?
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: He became a very brave man.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: A shame that he couldn't live the longer, more beautiful life I'd hoped he would.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But I was fortunate enough to hear his last performance. The cry of his instrument... was hardly inferior to the famed musician with whom he shared a surname.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh, was he the descendant of someone famous?
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn. Have you heard his work?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Who... did you just say?
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: People often call him the Witch King.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Th-That Witch King? *cough*... People hardly ever call him by name.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: Really? But to me, he was first and foremost a musician.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Uh... Everyone says he stopped performing with regular instruments toward the end of his life.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: His music... No, you could hardly call that noise music... They say it instilled fear in anyone who heard it.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: True. His rhythm was in no way harmonious. Every last measure far exceeded what his audience imagined based on the previous one.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But I'd never felt such a strong... will.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You really shouldn't talk about this on campus.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: I heard the Empresses' Voice and the Gendarmerie keep a close eye on Ludwigs-Universität. You'd be in deep trouble if they were to catch wind of it.
attributes.name: Motivated Student

attributes.content: You should return to your dorm.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Keep practicing this piece. No matter what commotion you may hear outside, focus only on your own rhythm.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Arturia.
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: So it's you. If you're here to speak to me personally, then I take it the show is about to begin?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Almost. Our guests are arriving as they should, one by one.
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: Will you be performing everything that will happen today for me, just like you used to? I'd like to be present when the melody begins.
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: You wish to listen from beginning to end? I'm afraid that would be a very long piece.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: A lot of people will be hurt today. Some will even die. They will be sacrificed because of me, and I cannot allow myself to look away.
attributes.name: Strange Voice From a Sculpture

attributes.content: Even though it hurts so much. You're far more determined than anyone.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You... When my performance reaches the end of your life, what will I see?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Ludwigs-Universität.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I've seen the name in more than a few books I've read. Most recently... in a leading publication on Originium Arts theory. But the name comes up as early as ancient scrolls engraved with secret Arts.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The crest of that university shines brilliantly in the history of Leithanien's Arts.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's merely a variant of the Urtica family crest.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: But it remains Leithanien's oldest university.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Once, I used to fantasize about life on a campus like this.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Walking through a campus covered with red leaves, surrounded by friends of similar ages, with an endless buffet of books and literature in the library... Every day must be fulfilling here.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: With Their Majesties' permission, you are free to enroll in any school in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Oh... have you noticed the eyes of the students walking around us?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Their thirst for knowledge is enough for them to forget the divide between their upbringings.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Yet before Kurfürst Ludwig chose to make his spire a 'university,' all knowledge was locked away by decree.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: So... how can I bring myself to use that very same authority to pollute such unique purity once more?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...The Gendarmerie?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Your so-called purity has never really existed.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Did you summon them here?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I wouldn't need to. The eyes up on the Spires have never looked away from Leithanien's lands.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: And especially not from here. Before you lies the oldest spire in the Urtica territory. The Witch King stayed in it for a decade, and often returned even after his coronation.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The campus may seem peaceful from the outside, but every centimeter of this place can be traced back to the Witch King.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: And that includes the man we're looking for.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Herr Gerhard Hoffmann?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Nein. We will find his teacher first. He's the one most familiar with Ludwigs-Universität.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Since the era of the Witch King... No, since an even more distant past, he's never left this school's most ancient spire.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: ...Why are there so many gendarmes on campus?
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: You said earlier that I was a wanted criminal.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You think they're here for you? No way... Besides, we've been very careful on the way. There's no way we got their attention.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: Quick. Find a place to hide!
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: Team 5, Team 6, move up.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Team 4, search the whole spire. Do not let any suspicious characters through.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Stop! You can't just run around and use Arts like you own the place.
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: This is a university. A lot of the research we do here requires a stable environment.
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Even the slightest disturbance could cause irreversible damage to the sophisticated equipment and the complicated Arts that have been cast.
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Seize him.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Why? I didn't break any laws!
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Your name.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Louis. Louis Schnitzler—You haven't answered my question!
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: The Schnitzlers of Fortsgard? Take him to the classrooms.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: I don't understand...
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Keep searching.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Take any commoners to the courtyard, and lock the nobles in the classrooms.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Take control of anyone and anything related to House Urtica.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: I'm only a Schnitzler by name! My father didn't even inherit the title. What gives you the right to do all this over something that happened decades ago—
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Because we're investigating what happened decades ago.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Young Herr Schnitzler. As long as you behave yourself, I assure you nothing will happen to you.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: My family will be participating in the celebration soon! I'm going to have an audience with Their Majesties!
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: Ludwigs-Universität is the most historic university in Leithanian! Not even the Kaiserinnen's armies dared damage a single brick of this spire twenty-three years ago!
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: What gives you the right to trample on knowledge and the arts, on Leithanien's traditions?!
attributes.name: Bewildered Student

attributes.content: The Kaiserinnen's orders, young Herr.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: The culprit who murdered our commander is hiding in this school.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: If you want to protect it, then tell all your classmates that they'd better report anything they know about a strange Sankta and the Witch King's remains.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: The Kaiserinnen's orders...?
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: No way...
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: You seem surprised.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Surprised? No, I'm just an idiot. Given her personality and disposition, how could I have thought she'd keep herself at arm's length?
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: I can't waste time chasing after Arturia anymore.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: I thought she was the target of your mission too.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Only part of it. My... client wants to understand the reasoning behind her actions, in order to prevent her from getting in the way of our plans.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: But now there's a bigger problem. I can't let this ruin the plan itself.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: I have no further questions. As you are Leithanian, I will not be required to execute your will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Forget it. Not like I was expecting anything resembling a goodbye from you.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: Herr Executor, the case Arturia is involved in is far more serious than you could ever imagine. Even your pope has no right to interfere.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: Here's some advice: abandon your mission before the Gendarmerie make it here. Leave Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Micha

attributes.content: I've completed my assessment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Abandoning this mission is not an option.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: We've arrived, Droste. You'd best wait outside.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Hm? I sense no danger...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Don't move.
...What?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You're blocking my pipe. Yes, the one puffing out smoke to your left. If you move, I can't guarantee that your left hand will remain after the smoke ring passes.
You use a smoking pipe as a wand?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: This? A wand? Don't be ridiculous. I smoke to relax. Who'd want to think about serious matters while smoking? I simply wanted run an experiment, and see if this smoke ring could float all the way to the top of the twin sheep's spire.
...We're here because we have important matters to discuss, Herr Fremont.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: What a killjoy, Reiner. If only you were as well-behaved as the lovely little doe next to you.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: I'd also be interested in seeing if a smoke ring could float for dozens of kilometers.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No, distance isn't the important factor. What matters is... not being blinded by that uselessly shiny armor of yours.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Alright, so you've ruined my mood. Now tell me, was it the gloomy sheep or the boastful sheep that asked you to come find me?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: So you're telling me a copy of the Güldenesgesatz was lost. The one stored in Sturmwind.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Do we pay you to sit around all day?! You're the Gesatzswächter, and you can't even keep an eye on the Güldenesgesatz. What good is that fancy getup of yours, other than being hung from the top of the Spires as an ornament?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Seriously, that Grimmacht. 'It's safer to keep it far away from the center of whirlpool'? Apparently, some of your idiocy rubbed off on her! Maybe the bigger your horns, the stupider you get!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: And don't get me started with that punk in Sturmwind! Honor his vow with his life? Like hell he did!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Kurfürst Werner has passed.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Before you stands his daughter.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: It's a pleasure.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: My condolences, if you want them. But that doesn't change the fact that this whole farce is the height of absurdity! Especially the fact that Grimmacht waited until now to tell me!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Is this stolen Güldenesgesatz really so special?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Twenty-three years ago, when Kurfürst Werner returned from Zwillingstürme to Sturmland, he had it on his person.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Aside from the Kaiserinnen and the Kurfürsten, no one wanted to be near it. My guess is that, like many of the Arts devices from the era of the Witch King, his Arts still remain in it.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The Witch King's Arts... The Witch King's Arts!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: The entrance of Ludwigs-Universität has that fool's Arts, too. They could have all the armors lining the streets start breakdancing right this moment—but is there a point?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Did Grimmacht never mention it? Those are no normal, frivolous Arts. They're Arts devices that Herkunftshorn himself spent his life developing, all to defeat his greatest foe!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: The Witch King's greatest foe... Do you mean Corsica I of Gaul?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: A mere emperor, leading a mere army. Do you really think transient might like that would have meant a thing to Herkunftshorn in his heyday?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: The enemy he defeated all those years ago was the will of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: ...The Güldenesgesatz.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Apparently you aren't a complete moron. Ever since the birth of the Leithanian Empire, the Güldenesgesatz has changed only once.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: All on his own, Herkunftshorn issued a challenge to Leithanien's forebears, as well as to all the Arts masters who put their energy into composing the Güldenesgesatz.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: My head... hah... It doesn't hurt as much anymore.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm afraid normal healing Arts won't help you very much. Your pain isn't caused by physical injuries.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I know. There's an evil old fart shouting my ear off. That's all.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You... You can actually hear him speak?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Occasionally.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That must be unbearable. Like his melodies, the Witch King's voice holds a power that is difficult to endure.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: If he wanted, he could kill a man simply by humming.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You've met him?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: My teacher, Herr Fremont, was once the Witch King's closest friend.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: When he sat atop the Witch King's Spire, there were once thousands of casters prostrating themselves before the steps to the throne. And I... I was one of them.
attributes.name: Gerhard
Ebenholz
attributes.content: So you're also...

attributes.name: Ebenholz
attributes.content: Ugh!
Is your head hurting again? Don't worry. I betrayed him in the end. I joined the resistance, and charged into the Spire under Grimmacht and Ewigegnade's leadership.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: That day, the steps I once kneeled before were... redder than even the leaves in the Ludwigs-Universität campus.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: It must have been a difficult battle.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: For every ten companions I fought beside, only one survived... Every last one of us was among the most capable in the country.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: If they had been as fortunate as me, they would have gone on to become even more outstanding scholars, even greater casters.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: No wonder you visited Forest Park that day. I should salute you and those who sacrificed their lives.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't waste your strength... I'm not worth it.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: If it hurts, though, feel free to lean on me.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Let him go.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Lessing...?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I knew you'd come after us.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Where's Professor Fremont?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: He's very disappointed in you.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Lessing. I don't want to hurt you, nor do I want to make an enemy of my dear teacher.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Then why stop us?
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: The Genesis Horn should not arrive like this.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: We're not pursuing any evil causes. We're simply retrieving what belongs to us and destroying what hinders us. You know that.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: The Witch King's relics... Who do they belong to? And who decides that?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You're a smart fellow, Lessing, and an honest one. You should think about these things, lest you regret all this in twenty or thirty years. I see you as my favorite student, which is why I don't want to see you make the same mistakes.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: I once... saw you as a dear mentor too.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: I still remember. You weren't even half as tall as you are now when Professor Fremont handed that sword to you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Yet in the blink of an eye, you're as old as I was when I stormed the Witch King's Spire.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: In school, time really does fly right by, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: My fear is that not enough time has passed. That I'm not strong or worthy enough to raise my sword for those I want to protect.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: I'm your target, remnant of the Witch King.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: And I have only one thing to say to you: Get out of my way.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Classes are almost over.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Come, this way!
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Maeyer, what are you doing standing here? Not auditing any lectures today?
attributes.name: Passing Student

attributes.content: Ahem... Why are you holding a sword in the school building? You really love training, don't you?
attributes.name: Passing Student

attributes.content: ...He chose this path on purpose.
attributes.name: Lessing

attributes.content: Have you heard? A large group of gendarmes barged into the school today. They're searching everyone they're coming across, especially commoners from the Urtica territory—
attributes.name: Passing Student

attributes.content: Hold on, why are you running so fast? Even up the stairs? The school administration doesn't allow that!
attributes.name: Passing Student

attributes.content: Are you okay? Why waste your strength on me? I'm much older than you. I should be the one protecting you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Haa... Haa... Well, I'm the one he's after. Besides, I don't want to see any more blood spilled on my account.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Considering Lessing's abilities and temperament, he'll catch up to us soon.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: We need to take a safer route.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Are we inside a school?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ludwigs-Universität.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You are of the Urtica bloodline. If the Witch King hadn't fallen when you were born, you would have studied Arts here.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: ...I'd really wish I weren't.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The Urticas have produced more than one Leithanian ruler. Aside from Herkunftshorn and the other Kaisers...
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Ludwig. Known as the Scholar, he was the Kurfürst of Einwald, and he too almost became the Kaiser of Leithanien. And he was also your ancestor.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: He wanted everyone to 'gain the most supreme knowledge,' so that the land would 'never again impede Leithanien.'
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: When he insisted on opening up his family's spire to all of Einwald's citizens, many thought he'd gone mad.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Mad... Heh. I suppose a lot of our family get called that.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Madness goes hand-in-hand with greatness. This has always been the way of House Urtica. Even the Witch King was a benevolent ruler of unsurpassed talent, before he succumbed to his madness.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: 'Succumbing to madness' has far more frightening connotations when it happens to a tyrant rather than a commoner.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: If that's another Urtica tradition, then I'll have to find somewhere to bleed out before it happens to me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: From the moment I laid eyes on you, I saw the bravery in you. But your life is precious, and self-destruction has never been the only path open to you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: Franz... May I call you Franz?
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: You know the name I threw away?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You won't ever be alone again. Let me help you.
attributes.name: Gerhard

attributes.content: ...Gerhard Hoffmann.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Of all my students, he's the one who knows best what the Güldenesgesatz really is.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: If only he were here. Then I wouldn't need to waste my energy explaining all this.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: How did you know our purpose here?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Purpose?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: The Witch King's remains killed my father, as well as two more who participated in the coup twenty-three years ago.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: We suspect that their next target is Herr Hoffmann.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Hoh, you came at just the right time, then. Just fifteen minutes ago... Wait, what did you just say?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Gerhard is involved with the Witch King's remains? The same 'remains' that experimented on Herkunftshorn's great-grandson simply to blow up a dime-a-dozen music hall?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: ...I suppose so. They may not be the exact same group, but they're working under a similar banner.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: But how do you know so much about even the finest details of the Vyseheim Incident?
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: This energy fluctuation... It's a sign that Arts were cast to maintain structural integrity here.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The same kind of Arts used by Einwald's caster army.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Don't mistake my Arts for their child's play.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Forget the Einwald of today, even when Herkunftshorn was still around, I was the one who taught all his lackeys their spatial Arts!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Stand back, Droste.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Why are you reaching for your blade? Stay away from my instruments. It's been centuries since this spire was last repaired, and it can't withstand being knocked around.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: ...Herr Fremont.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Is the experiment you were just conducting related to the Voice of Mundane?
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter
